name: Procedural Doggos
description:
Global Game Jam 2021 Submission Lost and Found

You are Jack Russell - a world renowned pet detective! With reports of missing local dogs, you're forced out of retirement to come back onto the job. Using your keen eye, look over your notes and hunt down the missing doggos, saving them from the awful fate of being sold off for DogeCoin.

Credits Assets utilised:

Blueberry font by Din Studio

Pumpking Story font by sronstudio

Cartoon Skybox Set 03 by Xot
